Detailed Description

This generic class handles objects. This class is derived from Attributes.
Author:
Anthony Liekens

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum Object::ObjectCodes
 

Enumeration of object codes. The following object codes can be used to set the code of an object : {\tt PseudoColor, Arc, Compound, Ellips, PolyLine, Spline, Text}

Enumeration values:
PseudoColorCode 
ArcCode 
CompoundCode 
EllipseCode 
PolyLineCode 
SplineCode 
TextCode

void Object::setCode (  ObjectCodes    code )  [inline, protected]
 

Sets the code of an object. This method can only be called by instances of Object

Parameters:
code  integer value
Returns:
void

virtual void Object::write (  std::ostream &    stream )  const [inline, virtual]
 

Write the object to a given outstream. All inherited classes of object should provide this method, since it's called by Figure (the object container) to output objects to a given stream.

Parameters:
stream  output stream
Returns:
void

Reimplemented in Arc, Ellipse, Polygon3D, PolyLine, PolyLine3D, Spline, Text, and Text3D.
